required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Safety Study of FSME-IMMUN NEW in Healthy Children and Adolescents Aged 1 to 15 Years
clinical_study.official_title: Open-label Safety Study of FSME-IMMUN NEW in Healthy Children and Adolescents Aged 1 to 15 Years

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to investigate the safety of five consecutive lots of FSME-IMMUN NEW in healthy volunteers. The main criterion for investigation is the fever rate after the first vaccination in three different age classes. The immunogenicity of 0.25 ml FSME-IMMUN NEW has been demonstrated in previous clinical studies in children; therefore, in the present study, immunogenicity was investigated in a subgroup only.

facility.name: Szpital Jana Pawla II Odz. Neuroinfekcji
